WMT,Wal-Mart creates $10 million fund to back U.S. manufacturing WASHINGTON, Jan 23 Wal-Mart Stores Inc, the world's largest retailer, said on Thursday it has created a $10 million fund to support manufacturing in the United States, and that one of its bicycle suppliers plans to start production in the U.S. this year. ~
